Docs.param:
If passing in a custom JsonSerializer, we recommend the following settings:
jsonSerializer.TypeNameHandling = TypeNameHandling.All.
jsonSerializer.NullValueHandling = NullValueHandling.Include.
jsonSerializer.ContractResolver = new DefaultContractResolver().

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: A Boolean that indicates whether the method call comes from a Dispose method (its value is true) or from a finalizer (its value is false).
Docs.summary: Disposes objects used by the class.
Docs.remarks: The disposing parameter should be false when called from a finalizer, and true when called from the IDisposable.Dispose method. In other words, it is true when deterministically called and false when non-deterministically called.
